venue.name: Zesiger Sports & Fitness Center at MIT

item.description:
The New England Multisport expo has clinics, seminars, products, and Karen Smyers :)...

here is the list of seminars http://www.multisport...

It is a quick walk from Dave's so I am planning on walking over after the breakfast run. The event itself is free, you can sign up for clinics on the website. I have heard great things about the total immersion clinics for those trying to get into swimming either for triathlons, or swimming in general.

Jen
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait outside near the bike racks

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: New England Multisport Expo
